verses.verse: What <S%G3739><s%> was from the beginning, <S%G746><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> we have heard, <S%G191><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> with our eyes, <S%G3788><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> we beheld <S%G2300><s%> and our hands <S%G5495><s%> handled, <S%G5584><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> of Life <S%G2222><s%> –

and the life <S%G2222><s%> was manifested, <S%G5319><s%> and we have seen <S%G3708><s%> and bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> and proclaim <S%G518><s%> to you the eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> was with the Father <S%G3962><s%> and was manifested <S%G5319><s%> to us –

what <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> we proclaim <S%G518><s%> to you also, <S%G2532><s%> that you also <S%G2532><s%> may have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with us; and indeed <S%G2532><s%> our fellowship <S%G2842><s%> is with the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and with His Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> we write, <S%G1125><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that our joy <S%G5479><s%> may be made <S%G4137><s%> complete. <S%G4137><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> is the message <S%G31><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> from Him and announce <S%G312><s%> to you, that God <S%G2316><s%> is light, <S%G5457><s%> and in Him there is no <S%G3756><s%> darkness <S%G4653><s%> at all. <S%G3762><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with Him and [yet] walk <S%G4043><s%> in the darkness, <S%G4655><s%> we lie <S%G5574><s%> and do not practice <S%G4160><s%> the truth; <S%G225><s%>

but if <S%G1437><s%> we walk <S%G4043><s%> in the light <S%G5457><s%> as He Himself <S%G846><s%> is in the light, <S%G5457><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> and the blood <S%G129><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> His Son <S%G5207><s%> cleanses <S%G2511><s%> us from all <S%G3956><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> we are deceiving <S%G4105><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> and the truth <S%G225><s%> is not in us.

If <S%G1437><s%> we confess <S%G3670><s%> our sins, <S%G266><s%> He is faithful <S%G4103><s%> and righteous <S%G1342><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> us our sins <S%G266><s%> and to cleanse <S%G2511><s%> us from all <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness. <S%G93><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%> that we have not sinned, <S%G264><s%> we make <S%G4160><s%> Him a liar, <S%G5583><s%> and His word <S%G3056><s%> is not in us.
